meta.description: Create TV-ready ads in less than 30 seconds with Adnexus Studio. AI-powered video generation tool for businesses of all sizes.
meta.og:title: Adnexus Studio - AI Video Generator for TV Ads
meta.og:description: Generate professional TV commercials instantly with AI. No creative skills required.

aiFeatures.name: Business Intelligence
aiFeatures.description: Automatically generates commercials based on business information

inputMethods.description: Enter business website URL to automatically generate ad content
Business name suggestion from Google Maps for local businesses

types.name: Business-based templates
types.description: AI generates template based on business type and details

features.title: Instant TV Ad Generation
features.description: Create professional TV commercials in less than 30 seconds with AI-powered automation

features.title: No Creative Skills Required
features.description: Anyone can create broadcast-quality ads without professional design or video production experience

features.title: 100% Free Video Creation
features.description: Generate unlimited TV-ready videos at no cost

features.title: URL-Based Generation
features.description: Simply enter your business website URL and AI creates your commercial automatically

features.title: Google Maps Integration
features.description: Pull business information directly from Google Maps for accurate local business ads

features.title: Full Customization
features.description: Customize AI-generated videos based on your specific business details and preferences

features.title: 500+ Channel Distribution
features.description: Deploy your videos across 500+ streaming channels and apps

features.title: Advanced Audience Targeting
features.description: Target by age, demographics, interests, income, location, and device type

features.title: Real-Time Performance Tracking
features.description: Monitor campaign performance with real-time analytics and measurement

features.title: Third-Party Measurement Support
features.description: Integrate with third-party analytics and measurement platforms

useCases.description: Create TV ads using Google Maps business information for local market reach
Generate product-focused ads from website URLs with automated content extraction
Build awareness with customized TV commercials targeting specific demographics
Scale TV advertising with AI-generated videos across 500+ channels

workflow.details: Enter URL or select business from Google Maps
AI creates TV-ready commercial in under 30 seconds
Adjust video content based on business needs
Select targeting parameters (age, location, interests, etc.)
Choose from 500+ apps and channels for distribution
Deploy campaign and monitor real-time performance

benefits.description: Generate broadcast-quality videos in under 30 seconds
100% free video creation eliminates production costs
No creative skills or professional help required
Distribute across 500+ channels and streaming platforms
Real-time tracking and optimization with AI-powered solutions
Full customization capabilities for brand alignment
